symptoms: Pain in the lower abdomen and pelvic region
Spotting between periods or before periods
Painful bowel movements, especially during menstruation
Bleeding from the rectum during menstruation
Other symptoms may include: Headaches Low grade fevers Depression Hypoglycemia Anxiety Susceptibility to infections and allergies
